other_tests.procedure_name: Fecal test for C. difficile toxin A & B
other_tests.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).
The gallbladder is moderately distended and contains a small amount of sludge. No wall thickening or cholelithiasis is seen. A small amount of pericholecystic fluid is seen.
